## Framework.make property

Instantiate a child instance and add to [Framework.children](/api/bud-framework/framework/children) container

Signature:

```typescript
make: methods.make;
```

## Remarks

\*\*make\*\* takes two parameters:

- The \*\*name\*\* of the new compiler - An optional callback to use for configuring the compiler.

## Example

```js
bud.make("scripts", (child) => child.entry("app", "app.js"));
```
